## KnowledgeBaseService/GetArticleByID
### Decrtiption: 
Поиск темы по ID.

### Message:
```
{
    "id": "bb7d5ba545e237cdd20aaa421135225e42bda863"
}
```

|Name|Type|Required fields|Description|
|-|-|-|-|
|id|string|Обязательное поле|ID статьи|

### Response:

Code 0

OK

Example Value:

```
{
    "article": ""
}
```
### Response:

CODE 13 INTERNAL

Operation couldn’t be completed because of an internal error at the server.    

Error: internal error
